content: I'd be very grateful if someone could take a look at PR #7552, which adds some extra functionality for analytic functions (locally given by power series): products of analytic functions are analytic, and 1 / x is analytic away from 0. This is preparatory to defining meromorphic functions.
Sorry for letting this slip off our radar. I'll review it now.
Some nitpicks about docstrings. Otherwise, it looks fine to my algebraic eyes.
There is a large overlap between this PR of mine, and a subsequent PR #7677 by @Geoffrey Irving. So one of us is going to have to do some rebasing work.

I think Geoffrey doesn't read this section of zulip, but he DM'd me saying it'll be a few more days before he can finish up #7677 anyway, so he's happy for this to go in first. CI is passing now â€“ are we good to merge?
